body: I wonder, was the travis build skipped because of a `[ci skip]` in a commit message?
Hmm, don't know. But wouldn't that only skip that commit?

Not sure:
https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/customizing-the-build/#Skipping-a-build
seems to suggest it's only the HEAD commit.

On Fri, Jun 8, 2018 at 1:53 PM, Joris Van den Bossche <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Hmm, don't know. But wouldn't that only skip that commit?
